name: Cocoa Camino Fair Trade  & Organic Instant Maple Hot Chocolate
description:
Rich delicious hot chocolate combined with the bright sweetness of maple sugar for a Canadian take on a cold-weather classic. Camino partnered with Citadelle Maple Syrup Producers’ Co-operative in Québec, taking their delicious organic maple syrup and pairing it with fair trade and organic cocoa.Certified fair trade and organic.Ingredients: golden cane sugar, cocoa powder, maple sugar, and maple flavour.May contain soy and milk.For the best taste experience avoid pairing with coconut milk.
